bio:
Alethius is a deceased Imperial soldier who can be found inside the Nchuand-Zel excavation site. Nchuand-Zel is an ancient Dwemer ruin under the city of Markarth. Alethius was killed by Nimhe, a giant Frostbite Spider.
Alethius was wearing a full set of light Imperial armor when he died. He was protecting four researchers that went out on an expedition in the excavation site. The researchers' name are Staubin, Stromm, Erj, and Krag. Alethius suspected that Erj and Krag were up to something.
name: Alethius
